column2: From this day forth I, as Patrician of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName], shall rule the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] as its Prince Mayor. Glory to the Republic and its Citizens!
The '§GWay of Life§!' DLC is not being used\n
Has '§YBusiness§!' focus or is of '§YVaishya§!' caste\n
No Merchant Republic has §YTrade Posts§! within §Y[Root.GetTitledName]'s§! demesne\n

Traders have brought you word that [From.GetFullName] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has renounced [Root.GetHerHis] feudal title and, as Patrician of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and in accordance of the will of the people, now rules as [From.GetTitle].\n\n[From.GetSheHeCap] has sent out a call to all true [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] sons to return to their homeland and with [From.GetHerHim] build [From.MercRepCapital.GetName] into a Grand City worthy of the new Merchant Republic.
Glory to the Republic and its Citizens!
As if I needed more competition...
[Root.GetDynName] founded a merchant republic in [Root.GetHerHis] domains, abandoning the old feudal ways.
